sourcesContent:
// src/i18n.js
import i18n from 'i18next';
import { initReactI18next } from 'react-i18next';
import LanguageDetector from 'i18next-browser-languagedetector';

const resources = {
  en: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "Welcome",
      logIn: "Log In",
      logOut: "Log Out",
      language: "Language",
      user: "User",
      exploreNow: "EXPLORE NOW",
      search: "Search...",
      heritageSite: "Heritage Site",
      categories: "Categories",
      events: "Events",
      // Add more translations as needed
      culturalSpotlights: "Cultural Spotlights",
      interactiveMap: "Interactive Cultural Map",
      viewMore: "View More +",
      viewLess: "View Less -",
      like: "Like",
      wishlist: "Wishlist",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
  hi: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "स्वागत है",
      logIn: "लॉग इन करें",
      logOut: "लॉग आउट करें",
      language: "भाषा",
      user: "उपयोगकर्ता",
      exploreNow: "अब खोजें",
      search: "खोजें...",
      heritageSite: "विरासत स्थल",
      categories: "श्रेणियाँ",
      events: "कार्यक्रम",
      culturalSpotlights: "सांस्कृतिक प्रकाश",
      interactiveMap: "इंटरैक्टिव सांस्कृतिक मानचित्र",
      viewMore: "और देखें +",
      viewLess: "कम देखें -",
      like: "पसंद",
      wishlist: "इच्छा-सूची",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
  mr: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "स्वागत आहे",
      logIn: "लॉगिन करा",
      logOut: "लॉगआउट करा",
      language: "भाषा",
      user: "वापरकर्ता",
      exploreNow: "आता शोधा",
      search: "शोधा...",
      heritageSite: "विरासत स्थळ",
      categories: "श्रेण्या",
      events: "कार्यक्रम",
      culturalSpotlights: "सांस्कृतिक प्रकाश",
      interactiveMap: "परस्पर सांस्कृतिक नकाशा",
      viewMore: "आणखी पहा +",
      viewLess: "कमी पहा -",
      like: "आवडते",
      wishlist: "इच्छा-सूची",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
  gu: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "સ્વાગત છે",
      logIn: "લોગિન કરો",
      logOut: "લોગઆઉટ કરો",
      language: "ભાષા",
      user: "વપરાશકર્તા",
      exploreNow: "હવે શોધો",
      search: "શોધો...",
      heritageSite: "વિરાસત સ્થળ",
      categories: "શ્રેણીઓ",
      events: "કાર્યક્રમ",
      culturalSpotlights: "સાંસ્કૃતિક પ્રકાશ",
      interactiveMap: "ઇન્ટરેક્ટિવ સાંસ્કૃતિક નકશો",
      viewMore: "હવે વધુ જુઓ +",
      viewLess: "હવે ઓછું જુઓ -",
      like: "ગમતું",
      wishlist: "ઇચ્છા-જોડણી",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
  te: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "స్వాగతం",
      logIn: "లాగిన్ చేయండి",
      logOut: "లాగౌట్ చేయండి",
      language: "భాష",
      user: "వాడుకరి",
      exploreNow: "ఇప్పుడు అన్వేషించండి",
      search: "అన్వేషించండి...",
      heritageSite: "ఐతిహాసిక ప్రదేశం",
      categories: "శ్రేణులు",
      events: "ఈవెంట్స్",
      culturalSpotlights: "సాంస్కృతిక స్పాట్‌లైట్స్",
      interactiveMap: "ఇంటరాక్టివ్ సాంస్కృతిక మ్యాప్",
      viewMore: "మరింత చూడండి +",
      viewLess: "తక్కువ చూడండి -",
      like: "నచ్చింది",
      wishlist: "ఇచ్చుకుంటే సరుకులు",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
  fr: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "Bienvenue",
      logIn: "Se connecter",
      logOut: "Se déconnecter",
      language: "Langue",
      user: "Utilisateur",
      exploreNow: "EXPLORER MAINTENANT",
      search: "Recherche...",
      heritageSite: "Site du patrimoine",
      categories: "Catégories",
      events: "Événements",
      culturalSpotlights: "Projecteurs culturels",
      interactiveMap: "Carte culturelle interactive",
      viewMore: "Voir plus +",
      viewLess: "Voir moins -",
      like: "Aimer",
      wishlist: "Liste de souhaits",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
  ja: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "ようこそ",
      logIn: "ログイン",
      logOut: "ログアウト",
      language: "言語",
      user: "ユーザー",
      exploreNow: "今すぐ探索",
      search: "検索...",
      heritageSite: "遺産サイト",
      categories: "カテゴリ",
      events: "イベント",
      culturalSpotlights: "文化のスポットライト",
      interactiveMap: "インタラクティブ文化地図",
      viewMore: "もっと見る +",
      viewLess: "少なく見る -",
      like: "いいね",
      wishlist: "ウィッシュリスト",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
  ru: {
    translation: {
      welcome: "Добро пожаловать",
      logIn: "Войти",
      logOut: "Выйти",
      language: "Язык",
      user: "Пользователь",
      exploreNow: "ИЗУЧИТЬ СЕЙЧАС",
      search: "Поиск...",
      heritageSite: "Наследие",
      categories: "Категории",
      events: "События",
      culturalSpotlights: "Культурные акценты",
      interactiveMap: "Интерактивная культурная карта",
      viewMore: "Смотреть больше +",
      viewLess: "Смотреть меньше -",
      like: "Нравится",
      wishlist: "Список желаемого",
      // ... add any other keys required
    },
  },
};

i18n
  .use(LanguageDetector)
  .use(initReactI18next)
  .init({
    resources,
    fallbackLng: 'en',
    interpolation: {
      escapeValue: false, // React already does escaping
    },
  });

export default i18n;
